author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Underpinned by the oaky notes of Patrón Reposado, the unexpected flavor combination of apple and chilli pepper come together in perfect harmony. Created by Bartender Cristian Bugiada from Rome, this potential Margarita of the Year offers plenty to fall in love with."
name: Margarita Amore
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Valentina-passionfruit syrup - combine two parts passionfruit syrup to one-part Valentina hot sauce and stir to combine
